data.question: What is the chemical stability of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 in KOH solution?
data.answer: Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 remains highly stable in KOH solution, retaining its skeleton structure.

data.question: How does the conductivity of Co-bpa compare to Co-bpy?
data.answer: The conductivity of Co-bpa is over 5 orders of magnitude higher than Co-bpy.

data.question: What effect does Ni2+ doping have on the conductivity of MOFs?
data.answer: Ni2+ doping significantly improves the conductivity of MOFs, with Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa showing the highest conductivity among the samples.

data.question: Is the specific capacitance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 higher than that of Co-bpy?
What is the specific capacitance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 at a current density of 1 A g@1?
Does the introduction of Ni2+ affect the crystallographic structure of MOFs?
data.answer: The introduction of Ni2+ does not disrupt the original crystalline structure and microscopic morphology of MOFs.

data.question: What is the capacitance retention of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 after 10,000 cycles?
How does the size of MOF particles affect their electrochemical performance?
data.answer: Nanoscale MOF particles, like Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200, show improved electrochemical performance due to shorter electron transport pathways and increased electroactive surface area.

data.question: Is the energy density of the ASC device using Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 higher than 50 Wh kg@1?
What is the role of hydrophobic polymethyl groups in the stability of MOFs?
data.answer: Hydrophobic polymethyl groups create a local hydrophobic environment to reduce the attack of water on the active centers, enhancing the stability of MOFs.

data.question: Does the ASC device using Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 retain over 90% of its initial capacitance after 10,000 cycles?
What is the effect of N-rGO loading on the electrochemical performance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200?
data.answer: N-rGO loading enhances the electrochemical performance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200, increasing its specific capacitance and improving its conductivity.

data.question: Can the ASC device using Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 power electronic devices?
What is the maximum energy density achieved by the ASC device using Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200?
data.answer: 76 Wh kg@1 at a power density of 500 W kg@1

data.question: Does the nanocomposite Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200@N-rGO show improved electrochemical stability compared to pristine Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200?
What is the specific capacitance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200@N-rGO at 1 A g@1?
How does the morphology of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200@N-rGO differ from that of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200?
data.answer: Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200@N-rGO exhibits a nanoflower topography, while Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 has a cuboid-shaped morphology.

data.question: Is the BET specific surface area of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200@N-rGO higher than that of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200?
What contributes to the enhanced electrochemical performance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200@N-rGO?
data.answer: The enhanced electrochemical performance is attributed to the synergistic effect between N-rGO and Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 particles, including improved conductivity, increased active sites, and enhanced stability.

data.question: Does the introduction of bimetallic nodes with a unique metal proportion improve the conductivity of MOFs?
